content: As an AI language model, I cannot make a definitive statement about the ability of parody to create lasting change. However, it is true that parody alone may not be enough to bring about long term change. While parody can highlight important issues and mobilize people to take action, it is often just one component of a larger movement aimed at social or political change. Parody can be a starting point for engaging people in a dialogue and making them more aware of important issues, but it may also be necessary to engage in more traditional forms of advocacy, such as protests, lobbying, or policy-making, in order to bring about lasting change. Ultimately, the effectiveness of parody depends on various factors, including the sociopolitical context, the message being conveyed, and the audience being targeted.
